Early life and education
Hayat Ahmad Khan was born in Lahore, British India in 1921.
He received his basic education and then graduated from the Islamia College, Lahore,
University of Punjab.
He later studied classical music at the Gandharva Mahavidyalaya, New Delhi Academy of classical music.
He completed his master's degree in music there.
